name: Chewy Oatmeal Coconut Bar Cookies
author: Carel
summary: This is a version of a different coconut bar cookie recipe made with butter. I tried it with coconut oil instead and it came out tasting much better. It is also made with much less sugar than the original recipe.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Melt brown sugar, coconut oil, and agave nectar in a small pot over medium heat; bring to a boil
Remove from heat; add oats and flour
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 minutes
Refrigerate until solid, at least 20 minutes
Cut into squares; you may need to pick up the whole thing and cut it from the side
